content: Error when changing index. The problem may be caused on the server side. Reload the page or check your Internet connection settings.

comment.text: Error message displayed when there's a problem changing the index of files, possibly due to server-side issues. It instructs users to reload the page or check their internet connection settings. Appears as an error notification in the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon after 'Սխալ՝ ինդեքսը փոխելիս:' which feels slightly abrupt. It could be improved with a more natural phrasing.

The English phrase 'Reload the page' is translated as 'Վերբեռնեք էջը'. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Armenian might be more appropriate. 'Վերածնեք էջը' or 'Թարմացրեք էջը' are common alternatives.
The word 'ດັດຊະນີ' (datchanee) is a correct transliteration of 'index' but might be less common or immediately understandable to all Lao speakers. A more common term might improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more widely understood term for 'index' if available.  Perhaps 'ລຳດັບ' (lam dap) which means 'sequence' or 'order'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the Lao translation is grammatically correct, the use of full stops (periods) at the end of each sentence might feel a bit formal for an error message. Consider a slightly more conversational tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a slightly less formal tone, possibly removing some full stops, depending on the desired style. This is subjective.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පුරණය' (puranaya) in 'පිටුව නැවත පූරණය කරන්න' is a less common or slightly archaic way to say 'reload'. A more standard term would improve clarity.
While technically correct, the phrase 'සේවාදායක පැත්තෙන්' is a bit clunky. Rephrasing for better flow would be beneficial.
The word 'проблем' is spelled incorrectly. It should be 'проблема'.
The term 'chỉ mục' is a direct transliteration of 'index' and while understandable, a more natural Vietnamese term for 'index' in this context would be 'vị trí' or 'chỉ số'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lỗi khi thay đổi vị trí. Sự cố có thể do phía máy chủ gây ra. Hãy tải lại trang hoặc kiểm tra cài đặt kết nối Internet của bạn.
